attributes.action: Scrap 100 Year Deal With Ukraine And Fund State Of The Art NHS Hospitals Instead
attributes.additional_details:
In addition there needs to be a full public audit of how the billions of taxpayers’ money already committed to Ukraine has been used.

Also those promoting wars, and those who seek taxpayers' money for wars without a vote of the people, must provide the people with regular substantive evidence that the money is being properly used and is not being used to enrich those who promote wars or those who seek taxpayers’ money for war.
attributes.background: Instead of sending billions of UK taxpayers’ money to Ukraine, we should commit those billions over a 100-year deal to the NHS and build state of the art hospitals, rather than exacerbate alleged ‘black holes’ in our public finances from our funding of foreign wars.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714468
